name: GG Bundle 2015
summary:
This bundle contains all the games released in 2015 by Grip Games: Q.U.B.E: Director's Cut is a brain-twisting first-person puzzler. Using special high-tech gloves, you manipulate the environment around you – build bridges, shift walls, open new paths - in order to journey deep into a mysterious giant cube hurtling through space towards Earth and destroy it from within before it eradicates all life on our planet!
Unmechanical: Extended is an award-winning platformer/puzzle game loved by countless players around the world, now coming to the PlayStation®4 system with a brand new “Extended” story episode that contains even more puzzles and mysteries to solve. Do you dare enter?
Tower of Guns is a fast-paced, bullet-hell, first person shooter with randomized levels and enemies, power ups, epic bosses and tons of unlockable items and weapons.

name: GG Aleste
summary: GG Aleste is a game in Compile's Aleste series of shoot-'em-ups for the Sega Game Gear. It was only released in Japan and is one of the few Compile Game Gear games published by Compile rather than Sega.

name: GG Portrait: Akira Yuki
summary: GG Portrait: Yuuki Akira is one of two games in the GG Portrait series. It contains images of Akira Yuki from Virtua Fighter Kids.

name: GG Nibbles
summary: Snake-like game for the Game Gear.

name: GG Portrait: Pai-chan
summary: GG Portrait: Pai Chan is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: G.G Series: Run & Strike
summary: Run & Strike is a racquetball simulator for DSi.

name: G.G Series: Air Pinball Hockey
summary:
Is it Air Hockey? Is it Pinball? It's Air Pinball Hockey!!

Enjoy the best of both worlds in this hybrid action table top style game. Use the "Smasher" to strike the puck away from your goal space and into the score bumpers and other targets above. Fulfill the conditions of each stage to advance to the next. If the puck makes it past your Smasher, 1 LIFE is lost. If all LIFE is lost, or the time runs out, the game is over. Every few stages an opponent Smasher appears for a round. Keep your reaction timing ready, aim for your challenger's goal and shoot for the high score!

name: G.G Series Collection Plus
summary: A compilation cartridge for DS featuring 30 G.G Series games -- 16 of which were originally released on DSiWare.

name: G.G. Series: Exciting River
summary: A DSiWare title where the player competes against computer opponents in kayaking races.

name: G.G. Series: Throw Out
summary: It's Robot Stadium Style Sports!

name: G.G Series Z.ONE
summary: A horizontal shmup for DSiWare.

name: G.G Series Wonder Land
summary: A vertical bullet hell shmup based on Alice in Wonderland for DSiWare.

name: G.G Series: Conveyor Konpou
summary: A DSi Ware title by Genterprise

name: G.G Series: Energy Chain
summary: A DSi Ware Tile by Genterprise

name: G.G Series Vertex
summary: Approaching polygons with missing vertices need to be completed before they cross the border line!

name: G.G Series Vector
summary: Can you handle the "Vector"?

name: G.G Series The Spiky Blowfish!!
summary: The Spiky Blowfish!!

name: G.G Series The Last Knight
summary: You are the last of the knightly order who still followed the ways of chivalry on a mission to brave the depths of the dungeon.

name: G.G Series The Hidden Ninja Kagemaru
summary: A Ninja game of Hide and Seek

name: G.G Series Shadow Army
summary: Infiltrate deep into enemy lines!

name: G.G Series Score Attacker
summary: Blast your way to the Hi Score!

name: G.G Series Great Whip Adventure
summary: The Great Whip Adventure

name: G.G Series Nyokki
summary: What is Nyokki?

name: G.G Series Hero Puzzle
summary: Fight monsters with the Hero Puzzle!

name: G.G Series: Super Hero Ogre
summary: This is a side-scrolling action game in which players battle cyborg enemies in city environments.

name: G.G Series: Ninja Karakuri Den
summary: Jump and slash as a gravity-defying ninja in this acrobatic action game.

name: G.G Series: Drift Circuit
summary: Use your drifting technique to gracefully slide past the competition.

name: G.G Series Drilling Attack!!
summary: Run, jump and drill your way through a maze full of enemies and danger deep beneath the Earth's surface.

name: G.G Series Cosmo Rally!!
summary: Compete in a Cosmic race to the finish!

name: G.G Series Conveyor Toy Packing
summary: Packing toys was never this fun!

name: G.G Series Altered Weapon
summary: Unleash the power of the Altered Weapon!

name: G.G Series Black X Block
summary: Assemble the blocks to get to the goal!

name: G.G Series Assault Buster
summary: Hold your position as the last defense!

name: G.G Series All Breaker
summary: Break all target blocks in each stage!

name: Ggang!
summary: 'Ggang!' is a virtual reality baseball game. You can either play the game alone with an AI pitcher, or with another player using a single device.

name: GG Aleste 3
summary: GG Aleste 3 is a sequel for the Aleste series and a direct followup to GG Aleste II, released in December 2020 as a special bonus included on the Aleste Collection for the Sony PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch and as part of the limited edition Game Gear Micro included with the premium edition of the collection. The game was developed as a true Game Gear game, not being a simple recreation of the system's technical aspects.

name: Ggg Collection: The Olivia Saga
summary: A small story about a prince that gets caught up in a war for his own soul.

name: Ggg Collection: Gubbie
summary: Gubbie needs to retrieve the pearls to lighten up his world. Get Gubbie through obstacles in this small 3d puzzle platformer.

name: Ggg Collection
summary: Dodge others as a line, jump as high as you can as a jumper, dodge hornets as a frog, throw pizzas at shades as scaterboy, blow up obstacles as bombman and smile away your foes.

name: Gga
summary: 《GGA》是一款MOBA类电子竞技俱乐部模拟经营游戏，目标是带领战队夺得冠军！

name: GG Date Me
summary:
Live out your progamer fantasies in this slice-of-life dating sim set in the exciting world of professional e-sports.

Choose one of four unique and charming characters to date and relegate the others to lesser roles in your life whether they like it or not.

name: GG-Party
summary: Dive into the wild open-world party game for up to 8 players! Explore the island, crush quests for big cash, grab properties and shops, and pull sneaky pranks on your friends. The first to become a millionaire wins the game!

name: GGX: Great Grandma Escape
summary:
Take one dose of stealth and one dose of comedy and what do you get? The most entertaining stealth game around.
Play as the “Granny” as you help her navigate her way out the hospital passed nurses, doctors, infected patients in order to get to her grandchild's birthday party. Using various pills and weapons, she will hide or hit her way to freedom.

name: GG Land
summary: GG Land is a place where all kinds of games meet together. And it also has a built-in game building tool! With this tool, you can create your own game in minutes without knowing anything about code or design!

name: GGmuks Casino: Slots
summary: Step into the fun and thrill of GGmuks Casino: Slots, where every spin is a chance to win big! Start with a small balance and place bets to chase exciting payouts with vibrant icons and a playful casino atmosphere. Enjoy classic slot machine excitement with a lighthearted, casual twist!

name: GG Puzzler
summary: GG Puzzler is a classic puzzle/mosaic game. You gonna need to build full picture of the girls out of small fragments using only small reference and your imagination.

name: GGnZ: Deck of the Dead
summary:
GGNZ: Deck of the Dead (Girls, Guns & Zombies) is a post-apocalyptic collectible card game where survival is fought one draw at a time. Build custom decks, scavenge for supplies, battle through campaigns, and face the infected. With mature mode where the world’s survivors find more than just hope.

he world is gone, but the fight isn’t over. In GGNZ: Deck of the Dead (Girls, Guns & Zombies), you’ll step into a gritty post-apocalyptic wasteland where survival depends on your wits, your allies, and the cards you play.

This isn’t just another deck-builder. It’s survival — one draw at a time.

Multiple Game Modes – Face the infected in escalating Scavenging Operations, test your strategy in Skirmishes, or battle through epic Campaigns like Uprising.

Build Your Decks – Assemble survivors, scavenge supplies, and unlock powerful abilities. Create custom decks tailored to your playstyle.

Scavenge & Survive – Risk everything on runs for resources. The higher the threat, the greater the rewards.

Faction Warfare – Align with the tactical Nomads, the brute-force Brawlers, or the cunning Scavengers. Each faction comes with its own unique style and legendary cards.

The HUB – Trade supplies for new cards and packs. Expand your options and strengthen your forces.

Party Mode (Adults Only) – Take a break from the battlefield with a unique social mode. Flirt, mingle, and connect with characters around the campfire in this mature, story-driven experience.

name: GGM
summary: Join friends online or play alone, find people around the world and get away from the cursed mansion as soon as possible
